author: AAA3A
name: ExportChannel
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
It does not use user data.
Remember that exporting other users' messages from Discord does not respect the TOS.
short: A cog to export all or part of a channel's messages to an html file!
description:
Have you ever wanted to export all or part of a channel's messages to an html file? Then this cog is for you!
Remember that exporting other users' messages from Discord does not respect the TOS.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
